title: How to FIX RADS error
body:
I see that there are still a lot of people with this issue, this worked for me and a lot of others.

FIX:
go to control panel > network and internet > network and sharing center

click change adapter settings 
right click the adapter you're using for your internet conection and go to properties
click on Internet Protocol Version 4 (TCP/IPv4)
click properties
check "use the following DNS server address"
for preferred DNS server enter 8.8.8.8
leave alternate.
click OK.
Enjoy league.

replies.body: It really depends on ISP they'are using. I'm pretty certain it doesn't work for TPG users.
I'm a TPG user and this fixed the problem for me.
